hanzi-su-wiki:
賛

Значения

Одобрять, хвалить, поддерживать

Мнемоника

  • За деньги 貝 правитель нанимал двух мужей 夫, помогавшими принять решение, отстаивая противоположные точки зрения в диспуте. Помогать, уяснять. Хвалить за консультацию.

  • "Мы похвалили мужей 夫, которые привезли с собой много моллюсков 貝."

Варианты

贊, 赞
purpleculture_pinyin:
zàn
Japanese variant of 贊 |赞
Японский вариант Like | Like
rtega_mnemonic:
賛賛RShelp, support, assist, aid, approve, praise
  • two men 㚘 helping each other earning money 貝, they approve of their own ways
heisig_constituent: approve, husband, shellfish, clam, oyster, eye, animal legs, eight, husband2
Keyword_KANJIDIC: approve, praise, title or inscription on picture, assist, agree with
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: одобрить, похвалить, название или надпись на картинке, помогать, согласен с
koohiiStory1: Out of two potential husbands, which would you approve of? Well, the one with shells (money) of course!!!
koohiiStory2: Bush´s campaign- "John Kerry approves using taxpayers´ money to support gay marriage. I don´t." "I approve this message".
jp_example_words:
賛美(さんび): praise, adoration, glorification
賛成(さんせい): approval, agreement, support, favour
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A husband and his husband find a shellfish and agree to share it.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture the husbands pulling a different side of the shellfish, it pops in two, and they each get a shell. They smile and high five.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: Since the husbands were able to agree, Santa-san (さん) believes they’re both good husbands and belong on the good list. Therefore, Santa-san gives them each lots and lots of shellfish for Christmas.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine Santa-san flying over the husbands in his sleigh, raining shellfish down upon them from the sky. It warms the heart, wouldn’t you agree?
Ru_Russian: поддерживать, соглашаться, одобрять, хвалить; подпись на рисунке
Ru_Meaning: approve, praise, title or inscription on picture, assist, agree with
Ru_Notes:
Сравни: 讃 (почесть, хвала; подпись на рисунке)
Сравни: 替 (かえる、かわる、タイ заменять), 賛 (たすける、サン одобрять)
Ru_Radicals: 二 (два), 亠 (крышка), 人 (человек), ハ, 大 (большой), 目 (глаз), 貝 (раковина)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the two husbands (夫) with the shellfish (貝) are in agreement

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to help.

Usage example 用法举例: 贊助 zàn zhù (support)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 99999

Shuowen 说文解字: 見也從貝從兟臣鉉等曰兟音詵進也執贄而進有司贊相之

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 賛 older 贊 from cowry (贝)貝 bèi and (rem- 㚘 bàn) from to-advance 兟 shēn C723 贊<賛讃> simp 赞. (name- support (赞)贊賛 zàn)

Applied rules : B004 贝貝

賛字的基本解释

賛
zàn
同“赞”。

賛字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zàn］
［《廣韻》則旰切，去翰，精。］
“赞1”的繁体字。亦作“賛1”。
(1)辅佐；帮助。
(2)随侍协助的人。
(3)推举；推荐。
(4)引导。
(5)告知。
(6)显明；通晓。
(7)赞礼；唱赞。
(8)赞美；称颂。
(9)参与。
(10)文体名。用于赞颂人物等，多为韵语。
(11)唐时吐蕃语称强雄为赞。
(12)姓。见《吕氏春秋·观表》。

賛字的康熙字典解释

【酉集中】【貝字部】　賛； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页1209第13
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】?則旰切，音讚。【五經文字】贊，經典相承，隷省作賛。

賛字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
賛字的起名意思

暂无。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zàn］
["Guangyun" is cut, go to Han, fine. ]
Traditional characters of "赞1". Also known as "Like 1".
(1) Assistant; help.
(2) People who are attending and assisting.
(3) Recommended; recommended.
(4) Guidance.
(5) Inform.
(6) Obvious; familiar.
(7) Praise; sing praises.
(8) Praise; praise.
(9) Participate.
(10) The name of the style. Used to praise characters, etc., mostly in rhyme.
(11) In the Tang Dynasty, the Tubo language praised Qiangxiong.
(12) Last name. See "Lü's Spring and Autumn · Watching the Table".
great
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Unitary Collection] [Beijing Department] 　zan; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 1209-13
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting]? It's cut, and the sound is praise. [Text of the Five Classics] Praise, the classics are inherited, and the province is praised.

zàn
яп. вм. 赞

賛

Значения

Одобрять, хвалить, поддерживать

Мнемоника

  • За деньги 貝 правитель нанимал двух мужей 夫, помогавшими принять решение, отстаивая противоположные точки зрения в диспуте. Помогать, уяснять. Хвалить за консультацию.

  • "Мы похвалили мужей 夫, которые привезли с собой много моллюсков 貝."

Варианты

贊, 赞

Radicals: 夫, 貝  (husband, shellfish)
Meaning Mnemonic
A husband and his husband find a shellfish and agree to share it.
Picture the husbands pulling a different side of the shellfish, it pops in two, and they each get a shell. They smile and high five.
Reading Mnemonic
Since the husbands were able to agree, Santa-san (さん) believes they’re both good husbands and belong on the good list. Therefore, Santa-san gives them each lots and lots of shellfish for Christmas.
Imagine Santa-san flying over the husbands in his sleigh, raining shellfish down upon them from the sky. It warms the heart, wouldn’t you agree?
